Henger Glitch?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 1 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Henger Glitch?
By Anonymous on Thursday, May 24, 2007 - 03:23 pm:

Some time ago, on the 1st week of July, Year 1001, I combined a Dino and a Hare in hopes of receiving a new monster when suddenly, the ice melted to reveal... an Omega. Shocked, I have retested this several times, yielding only either a Scaler or a Spot every time. The original data is gone, but I still remember the incident... Eyewitnesses can also testify to the truth of this occurrence. That said, is there some sort of strange defect in the game itself? Is there such a thing as a one-time glitch?

By Lisa Shock on Thursday, May 24, 2007 - 04:08 pm:

Do you, or someone in your household, own a cheat device?

Generally, these sorts of reports wind up being pranks played by brothers, cousins, etc.

By Anonymous on Monday, May 28, 2007 - 05:16 pm:

Actually, while they did borrow one at one point, the time when I saw my Omega occur and the time when my brothers were lent a cheat device (a Gameshark) were seperated by 3 months (after which they returned it).

However, I do appreciate the tip, and I shall watch for this in future games!
